data.eml:eml: This is the water board of the province of Limburg. It was formed on 1 January 2017 when the Peel and Maasvallei, and Roer and Overmaas Water Boards merged. It now encompasses the entire province of Limburg. It oversees an area of about 221,000 ha.Positive observations without protocolDataset available via https://www.ndff.nl/english / serviceteamndff@natuurloket.nl27,572 records (Februari 2018)
